<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Redirect Goal to new data model</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function updateAppModules(sysId, columnMap) {
    var sysAppModuleGlideRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_app_module');
    sysAppModuleGlideRecord.get(sysId);
    if (sysAppModuleGlideRecord.isValidRecord()) {
		for (var key in columnMap) {
			sysAppModuleGlideRecord.setValue(key, columnMap[key]);
		}
        if (sysAppModuleGlideRecord.update()) {
            gs.info('Redirect Goal to new data model: Successfully updated navigator module to new data model for app mopdule with sys id:' + sysId);
        }else{
			gs.info('Redirect Goal to new data model: Failed updatating navigator module to new data model for app mopdule with sys id:' + sysId);
		}
    }else{
		gs.info('Redirect Goal to new data model: Failed updatating navigator module to new data model for app mopdule with sys id:' + sysId);
	}
}

var appModules = {
    '7fd1f01b873003008a4a578c87cb0b77': {
        'name': 'sn_gf_goal'
    },
    '68333c1b873003008a4a578c87cb0b1f': {
        'name': 'sn_gf_strategy',
        'sys_name': 'Strategic Priorities',
        'title': 'Strategic Priorities'
    },
    '62637c1b873003008a4a578c87cb0b56': {
        'active': false,
    }
};
for (var key in appModules) {
    updateAppModules(key, appModules[key]);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-10-22 13:58:47</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>97f5d5ee535f3010c8d4ddeeff7b12b7</sys_id>

        <sys_name>Redirect Goal to new data model</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Business Planner" source="com.snc.apm.business_planner">3fffcee747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43ce</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_97f5d5ee535f3010c8d4ddeeff7b12b7</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
